attributes.additional_details: We need a SIGN like the give up your seat for someone disabled, but a give up your cue position for a emergency services person.
attributes.background: I am campaigning for mainly the NHS emergency services staff when in uniform (paramedics/Ambulance) to have priority in cues in any services/garage/shops. Our NHS heroes only have short breaks in between saving lives, we need to serve our emergency services FIRST.

rejection.details:
At the moment, this would be a decision for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you'd like Parliament to make this a legal requirement, you could start a new petition asking for that.
